description: Fix TS2345 (Argument type) errors in src/hooks/utilities directory by adding code

workstreams.description: Analyze all files in src/hooks/utilities for TS2345 errors
Fix argument type errors by adding types, wrappers, and conversions

decisions.decision: Added ReduxAction interface to fix dispatch argument type mismatches in studentRedux.ts
decisions.rationale: Dispatch expects action objects, not void. Created proper action object structure.

decisions.decision: Added useRouter and usePathname hooks in useRouteState function
decisions.rationale: Router and pathname were undefined. Added proper Next.js navigation hooks.

decisions.decision: Replaced cacheTime with gcTime in TanStack Query configurations
decisions.rationale: cacheTime is deprecated in newer versions. Updated to gcTime.

decisions.decision: Reorganized useOfflineQueue callbacks to fix dependency order
decisions.rationale: syncItem needs to be defined before syncAll to avoid circular dependencies.
